dialogue.line: ...I ...I won.
You see that babe? I won!
Yeah! You... really did...
Baby, you okay?
Throat hurts...
Aren’t you supposed to be a Fairest? You went down easier than I thought!
You know what...
Congratulations. You beat me fair and square!
Huh? That’s all you’re gonna say?
Yup! You won, Sven, congrats!
For what it’s worth, I had a lot of fun.
Thank you, everyone.
You did? I-...I’m glad.
Hey, Ben.
Y-Yeah?
You put up a good fight. You’re a lot tougher than I realized.
Seems I had the wrong idea about you. I’m sorry for earlier.
Oh, uh... thank you. You sing a lot better than I thought you would, too!
UH, NO OFFENSE, OF COURSE!
None taken.
WAIT What time is it??!!
Oh goodness, I’m gonna be late! My parents think I’m reading at the library...
Huh?! They don’t know you’re on a date?
They’d kill me if they knew I was with Sven, let alone how’d they feel if they knew I was with you two as well.
You’ve never... lied to your parents before.
Yeah, well... I gotta live my own life sometime, y’know.
... you’re absolutely right.
Ready to go Sven?
Sure, darling.
It was nice seeing you two again! Sorry for the trouble...
No hard feelings. Be safe getting home, you two.
...ahem?
Oh, uh... yeah, have a good day.
You know... You really should be nicer.
Nah.
Heh, fair enough. Man, what a day...
Well, since the double date didn’t really plan out... do you wanna go on an actual date with me?
Really?
Well yeah, I mean... We didn’t even get to order.
Let’s grab something to eat while we’re here.
I would love to.
